name: id
description: Primary key: Unique identifier for the business.

name: cpa_firm_id
description: Foreign key: ID of the CPA firm managing this business.

name: city
description: City where the business is located.

name: ein
description: Unique Employer Identification Number of the business.

name: contact_name
description: Name of the business contact person.

name: contact_phone
description: Phone number of the business contact person.

name: contact_email
description: Email address of the business contact person.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the business record was created.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the business record was last updated.
